title: Scattered rainfall greets UAE residents
text:
Scattered rainfall greets UAE residents Web Team /Dubai   08.48 am Share 
(KT file photo) Light rainfall occurred in select areas of the UAE throughout the morning. Scattered rainfall occurred around the UAE during the early hours of the morning on Monday according to the National Centre of Meteorology and Seismology (NCMS). Multiple updates by the NCMS indicate that the rain occurred in the areas of Ghayathi, Al Ruwais, Dalma, Khalifa City and Tawiyen as early as 6:45 am. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 20, 2017 In general, today's weather will be partly cloudy, with a slight chance of rain. Strong winds might occur throughout the day which could impede visibility due to rising dust. Humidity is also forecast to increase as the day progresses. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 20, 2017 According to weather.com , residents can expect today's temperatures to peak at 19°C and lows of 18°C. Share
